text: Hurricane Ike roared through Galveston
in Houston early Saturday morning making
landfall at about 3:30 a.m. and leaving
a trail of destruction in its wake

battered by the storm the winds blew out
the windows of skyscrapers ripped off
awnings uprooted trees toppled

scattered about like children's blocks
powerlines were snapped off like
